quote_first: At 10.15 Arlena departed from her rondezvous,
quote_last: Patrick Redfern came down and registered surprise, annoyance, etc. Christine's task was easy enough. Keeping her own watch concealed she asked Linda at twenty-five past eleven what time it was. Linda looked at her watch and replied that it was a quarter to twelve.
title: Evil Under the Sun
author: Agatha Christie
